hymn.title: He knows, He knows
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By Trusting the Lord

Fear not, He knows; And you know He is a -- ble To care for You, So trust the best is planned! Oh Lord, You know; 'Tis a thought so joy -- ous! Though I don't know, What need have I to fear? You know, You know; Thank and praise You, Je -- sus! Through all un -- knowns, You make Your -- self so dear!

lyrics.stanza: Oh Lord, You know; 'Tis a thought so joyous! Though I don't know, What need have I to fear? You know, You know; Thank and praise You, Jesus! Through all unknowns, You make Yourself so dear!
Just trust, He knows Life's still unwritten letter. Just trust, He knows Plans time would now disguise. Just trust, He knows, He sees which turn is better; At the right time He'll open up your eyes!
